Package utils

Class MPCBuilder<ObjectT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.FRESCOBuilder<ObjectT>
      • utils.MPCBuilder<ObjectT>
  • Type Parameters:
    ObjectT - The Object type the Builder extension wants to implement (either client or host)
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MPCCustomerBuilder, MPCHostBuilder
    public abstract class MPCBuilder<ObjectT>
extends FRESCOBuilder<ObjectT>
    The abstract builder class to instantiate the application objects. This builder takes care of the boiler plate code which is required to setup the framework. It also handles the use case specific input, these two parts could be separated at some point..

      • withResourcePool

        public MPCBuilder<ObjectT> withResourcePool​(dk.alexandra.fresco.suite.spdz.configuration.PreprocessingStrategy strategy,
                                            int modBitLength,
                                            CmdLineParser.obliviousTransferProtocol obliviousTransferProtocol)
                                     throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Initializing the resourcePool Object required by the framework. MASCOT has to be used as a preprocessingStrategy to achieve active security
        Overrides:
        withResourcePool in class FRESCOBuilder<ObjectT>
        Parameters:
        strategy - the PreprocessingStrategy used
        modBitLength - the bitLength of the modulus (128 bit is recommended)
        obliviousTransferProtocol - Define whether secure NAOR Pinkas or Dummy shall be used
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - thrown when preprocessingStrategy is unknown
